headline: DoubleVerify’s Q2 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: DoubleVerify’s second quarter saw a positive market reaction, with management attributing the 21% revenue growth to broad-based expansion across its activation, measurement, and supply-side segments. CEO Mark Zagorski emphasized that existing advertisers drove the majority of growth through increased use of new DoubleVerify solutions and deeper product adoption across channels.
